article.title: This is an Example
article.intro: The intro tag provides the ability to add a nice welcoming feel to every Formulae article. This section should include a brief overview of the purpose of the mathematics below.

concept.question: This is where a question goes

article.conclusion: The conclusion should include some more juicy stuff like the intro.
